caption: Table 1: Results (%) for data-free class-incremental learning on CIFAR-100 for various numbers of tasks

Table 2: Results (%) for class-incremental learning with replay data on CIFAR-100 for various numbers of tasks (5, 10, 20). A coreset of 
2000 images is leveraged for replay-based methods, and thus these methods do not meet problem the DFCIL constraints (note we report 
for our method numbers without any coreset). Results are reported as an average of 3 runs.
